alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pueblo County through 700 PM MDT... At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Avondale, or 17 miles southeast of Pueblo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Pueblo County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
